name: CQ_Analytics.ClientContext
doc:
The ClientContext object is a facade to access / update the session stores and
their properties c...

methods.name: clear
methods.doc: Clears all the stores loaded in the ClientContext (removes properties and values)

methods.name: get
methods.doc: Returns a store or the value of a property from a store loaded in the ClientContext

methods.name: persist
methods.doc: Persists the full ClientContext content or the specified store.

methods.name: reset
methods.doc: Resets all the stores loaded in the ClientContext (reset to initial values)

methods.name: set
methods.doc: Sets the value of a property from a store loaded in the ClientContext
